subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|肋間|ろっかん}}: [[intercostal]]
* {{ja-r|肋間神経|ろっかん しんけい}}: [[intercostal]] [[nerves]]
* {{ja-r|肋間神経痛|ろっかん しんけいつう}}: [[intercostal]] [[neuralgia]]
* {{ja-r|肋筋|あばらきん}}: in [[reinforced concrete]], the [[box]]-shaped [[rebar]] connecting the main vertical support rebar: the [[rib]]s of the structure
* {{ja-r|肋骨|ろっこつ}}: [[あばらぼね]], ''[[abarabone]]''}}: [[rib]], [[costa]]
* {{ja-r|肋材|ろくざい}}: the [[rib]]s of a [[ship]], extending upwards from the [[keel]] to the [[gunwale]] and supporting the [[hull]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|肋軟骨|ろくなんこつ}}: the [[costal]] [[cartilage]] connecting the [[rib]]s and the [[sternum]]
* {{ja-r|肋肉|ばらにく}}: [[rib]] [[meat]], generally [[beef]] or [[pork]]
* {{ja-r|肋板|ろくばん}}: a [[turtle]]'s [[plastron]]; a [[thwart]]: a [[steel]] [[plate]] or similar support running from [[port]] to [[starboard]] between the [[rib]]s of a [[ship]] to strengthen the [[hull]]
* {{ja-r|肋膜|ろくまく}}: the [[pleura]]
* {{ja-r|肋膜炎|ろくまくえん}}: [[pleurisy]], [[pleuritis]]
* {{ja-r|肋木|ろくぼく}} [[wall bars]], a kind of [[exercise]] [[equipment]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|あばら|yomi=k}}
By extension from {{l|ja|荒}}, {{l|ja|荒ら|tr=''abara''}}, "loosely spaced with sizable gaps", itself possibly related to the root {{l|ja|ばら|tr=''bara''}}, "scattered".

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ばら|バラ}}

# short for {{l|ja|肋肉|tr=''[[baraniku]]''}}: [[rib]] {{qualifier|meat, generally [[beef]] or [[pork]]}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This word is more often spelled in [[hiragana]] as {{l|ja|ばら}} or in katakana as {{l|ja|バラ}}.
